description:
When Krillin speaks to the Eldest Namekian, he gets a double surprise!  Not only does he receive a Dragon Ball, but the sleeping powers within him are awoken!  Will Krillin’s incredible new strength be enough to save his friends?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kibou no Hoshi o Mamore!! Krillin Kyoui no Power Up
Rencontre avec le chef des Nameks
É preciso proteger o planeta da esperança!! Kuririn aumenta o seu poder
ปกป้องดวงดาวแห่งความหวัง!! คุริริน Power Up
希望の星を守れ!! クリリン驚異のパワーUP
